data.actual_result: everyone in the LFG will be able to turn on video feed
data.steps_to_repro: - join an LFG chat - have someone spam the chat - click the group message that shows up on your IOS device (only iPhones get this notification and it will disappear within a couple seconds, see attached picture for what this will look like) - once clicked, you will be able to see the LFG group chat on your phone - click the "join call" button - click the video calling button - once your video feed is on, others will be able to turn it on aswell using the following steps: - open the LFG chat on desktop while someone else has the video call active - click on another chat and you should be able to see the small version of the video feed in the corner of your screen (see attached image) - hover over the video feed and you should be able to see the screen share and turn on video feed options
